TopicTitle: [BUG] You can do science twice with goo container or science jr.

Articles.Content:
It works like this.

1. Use the experiment.

2. Keep Data

3. Reset experiment using the first/part menu (where review data is)

4. For a brief moment you can click review data (do both 3. and 4. at nearly same time)

5. Transmit experiment

6. You can now use the experiment again, but this time you must transmit immediately. Actually you might be able to keep data and transmit it later but you cannot reset it again.

Im on hard career.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-29T16:15:06Z" title="04/29/2015 04:15  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 29, 2015</time> by Beduino**
